qas.question: What type of temperament became accepted during the 18th century?
When did equal temperament become accepted as the dominant musical temperament?
What temperament is the English Renaissance performed in?

context: While <a0_0>equal temperament<a0_0/> became gradually accepted as the dominant musical temperament during <a1_0>the 18th century<a1_0/>, different historical temperaments are often used for music from earlier periods. For instance, music of the English Renaissance is often performed in <a2_0>meantone temperament<a2_0/>.
